name: KNS Technologies Pvt. Ltd.
tag_list: indian-stock-quotes, indian-investments, investments-in-india, options-and-futures-india, commodities-trading-in-india, mutual-funds-in-india, ulips, real-estate
description: Web Devl and IT services to Finance Ind
overview:
A complete Personal Finance Portal for India based investments

KNS Technologies Pvt. Ltd. owns and maintains a personal finance portal www.bullshouse.com that is aimed to be the only portal the India based investors would need. KNS Tech also provides Web development services for third parties.

As a first phase, KNS Tech is concentrated on releasing the personal finance portal and is expected to go live in Jan-2011. This portal will include infomation related to Indian Stock Quotes, Mutual Fund information, Insurance/ULIPS, Commodities, Options and Future, Real Estate, Macro Economic Indicators, Blogs and Forums.

Currently In India, there are only two broad categories of websites that provide financial information. Stock broker owned free but basic sites such as www.icicidirect.com and www.ifinltd.in and premium contents such as Bloomberg terminals that cost a fortune which are generally out of reach for most individuals, small and medium institutions. Bullshouse strategy is to fill the gap between the basic personal finance web sites and high end software.
